text: Devit tɨghar ovengamin dughiamɨn, a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nan otarim Solomon, a bar otarir igiam, egha a dɨpenibar ingaramin arazibagh fozir puvatɨ. Ezɨ kɨ kamaghsua, Solomon Ikiavɨra Itir God bagh Dɨpenir bar aghuitamɨn ingarightɨ, kantribar gumazamiziba bar moghɨra Dɨpenir kam bagh bar akuegh, egh ziar ekiam isɨ a danɨngam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ uabɨ Solomon bagh biziba inigh da arɨghtɨ, a Dɨpenimɨn ingaram.”
